original: 'o na ji ltar byang chub thob par 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ji ltar byang chub thob par 'gyur zhe na /

original: de ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: de ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /

analyzed: de ltar bshad ma thag pa lta bu'i so sor rtog pa'i mtshan nyid kyis shes rab kyis zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //

original: zhum pa'i sems med pa zhes bya ba ni brtse ba chen po'i mthus nyan thos la sogs pa'i byang chub la chags pa med pa zhes bya ba'i don te /
analyzed: zhum pa'i sems med pa zhes bya ba ni brtse ba chen po'i mthus nyan thos la sogs pa'i byang chub la chags pa med pa zhes bya ba'i don te /

analyzed: 'di ni zung du 'brel ba'i tshogs yin no // 'di nyid kyi che ba'i bdag nyid bstan pa'i phyir go cha zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /

analyzed: sems dpa' chen por tha snyad gdags pa'i rgyu bshad zin to //

original: theg pa chen po la zhugs pa zhes bshad pa gang yin pa de la theg pa chen por tha snyad gdags pa'i rgyu mtshan gang yin zhe na /
analyzed: theg pa chen po la zhugs pa zhes bshad pa gang yin pa de la theg pa chen por tha snyad gdags pa'i rgyu mtshan gang yin zhe na /

analyzed: ci'i phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //

analyzed: de lta bas na 'dir rgyu bshad pa de gang zhes bya ba ni bshad ma thag pa lta bu'i chos dge ba'i rang bzhin la'o //

analyzed: zhon nas zhes bya ba ni bdag nyid tshogs bsags pa nyid kyis de la gnas zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //

analyzed: de dag kyang bdag nyid kyi tshogs ji lta ba bzhin du 'god pa'i phyir te /

analyzed: theg pa gzhan la rnam pa 'di mi srid pa'i phyir ro snyam du dgongs pa yin no //

analyzed: 'di ni thams la mkhas pa'i tshogs yin no //

original: mkha' 'dra zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: mkha' 'dra zhes bya ba smos te /

original: 'di ni ye shes kyi tshogs yin no //
analyzed: 'di ni ye shes kyi tshogs yin no //

original: bsod nams kyi tshogs yin no //
analyzed: bsod nams kyi tshogs yin no //

original: 'di ltar dga' ba ni zag pa med pa ste /
analyzed: 'di ltar dga' ba ni zag pa med pa ste /

analyzed: mngon par 'thob byed ces bya ba ni mngon du thob par byed pa'o //

original: tshogs kyi sgrub pa bshad zin to //

analyzed: de la theg pa ni phyogs gzhan la sogs par phyin par byed pa'i bdag nyid kyis 'gro ba'i byed pa'i khyad par yin par grags so //

analyzed: de la 'di phyogs gang du 'gro na theg pa yin zhes na /
translated: In this regard, if one asks, ‚ÄúTo what place does this vehicle go?‚Äù

original: gang zhig zhon nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
analyzed: gang zhig zhon nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //

original: phyogs zhes smos pa ni nye bar mtshon pa tsam du zad de /
analyzed: phyogs zhes smos pa ni nye bar mtshon pa tsam du zad de /

analyzed: de yang dmigs su med ces bya ba lhag ma yin no //

analyzed: de lta bu ni sems can gyi don du nges par 'byung ba'i sgrub pa yin no //
translated: Such is the proof of the deliverance for the sake of sentient beings.

original: gal te 'o na ji ltar mya ngan las 'das par 'gro bar tha snyad gdags she na /
analyzed: gal te 'o na ji ltar mya ngan las 'das par 'gro bar tha snyad gdags she na /
translated: If one asks, Well then, how is one conventionally said to go to nirvana?

original: mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
analyzed: mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
translated: The phrase nirvana and so on is stated.

analyzed: 'di skad du re zhig gzhan gyis kun brtags pa'i 'gro ba la sogs pa'i bya ba ni mi 'thad de /

analyzed: de ni rdzas la brten pa'i phyir la yan lag can la sogs pa'i rdzas kyang med @134a * //

analyzed: pa'i phyir ro zhes bya bshad zin to //

analyzed: mya ngan las 'das pa kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa tsam gyi mtshan nyid du ni kun nas nyon mongs pa nyid 'gro ba ma yin te /
translated: NirvƒÅ·πáa is not characterized by mere freedom from affliction, because affliction is not going.

original: de'i tshe na de med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i tshe na de med pa'i phyir ro //

original: rnam par byang ba yang ma yin te /
analyzed: rnam par byang ba yang ma yin te /

analyzed: de yang 'khrul pa dang bral ba tsam gyi ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //

analyzed: gal te sems bskyed pa phyin ci ma log pa'i bdag nyid kyi rnam par byang ba zhig der 'gro bar 'gyur ro zhe na ma yin te /
translated: If you think that the nature of the mind, which is the generation of the thought of enlightenment, goes there, that is not so.

analyzed: dngos po dang dngos po med pa dag 'brel ba med pa'i phyir ro //

analyzed: mya ngan las 'das pa ma yin pa'i bdag nyid yin na ni rnam par byang bar ngo bo nyid gcig pa yin pas ci'i phyir der 'gro bar 'thad pa ma yin no //
translated: If it is not the nature of nirvana, then since it is the same nature as purification, why is it not tenable that it goes there?

original: de nyid der 'gro bar 'gyur ba ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de nyid der 'gro bar 'gyur ba ni ma yin te /
translated: It is not that very thing that goes there.

original: 'gro ba po dang bgrod par bya ba dag ni gzhi tha dad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'gro ba po dang bgrod par bya ba dag ni gzhi tha dad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the goer and the destination are different bases.

original: 'gro ba la sogs pa ji ltar mngon par zhen pa gzung ba la sogs pa'i bdag nyid du med pa'i yang phyir ro //
analyzed: 'gro ba la sogs pa ji ltar mngon par zhen pa gzung ba la sogs pa'i bdag nyid du med pa'i yang phyir ro //
translated: and because going, etc., do not exist in the way they are imagined, as the nature of grasping, etc.

original: de lta bas na mya ngan las 'das pa ni gtso na 'gro ba la sogs pa mi dmigs pa tsam kho na ma btsal bas rab tu 'grub pa'i dga' ba yin no zhes bshad par 'gyur te /
analyzed: de lta bas na mya ngan las 'das pa ni gtso na 'gro ba la sogs pa mi dmigs pa tsam kho na ma btsal bas rab tu 'grub pa'i dga' ba yin no zhes bshad par 'gyur te /
translated: Thus, nirvana is the mere non-apprehension of going, etc., when the principal is not sought. It is the joy of complete success.

original: lhun gyis grub par nges par 'byung ba'i sgrub pa yin no //
analyzed: lhun gyis grub par nges par 'byung ba'i sgrub pa yin no //
translated: It is the means of achieving the spontaneous deliverance.

original: 'di nyid 'jig rten na grags pas rab tu sgrub pa'i phyir /
analyzed: 'di nyid 'jig rten na grags pas rab tu sgrub pa'i phyir /
translated: In order to demonstrate that this is well established in the world, he says:

original: dper na zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: dper na zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: For example,

original: 'jig rten gyi tha snyad med shi bar song ngo zhes bya bar yang de'i 'gro ba mi dmigs pa tsam kho na la 'jug pa'i phyir ro snyam du dgongs pa yin no //
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi tha snyad med shi bar song ngo zhes bya bar yang de'i 'gro ba mi dmigs pa tsam kho na la 'jug pa'i phyir ro snyam du dgongs pa yin no //
translated: when someone dies, the world does not exist, and it is only the mere non-apprehension of his going that is meant.

original: der 'gro ba mi snang ba'am dus su 'phos pa yin no zhes bya bar yang rigs pa dang ldan pa ma yin te /
analyzed: der 'gro ba mi snang ba'am dus su 'phos pa yin no zhes bya bar yang rigs pa dang ldan pa ma yin te /
translated: It is not reasonable to say that going is not seen there, or that it has passed beyond the time.

original: tshad ma med pa'i phyir dang tshad mas gnod pa'i yang phyir ro //
analyzed: tshad ma med pa'i phyir dang tshad mas gnod pa'i yang phyir ro //
translated: Because there is no valid cognition, and because it is contradicted by valid cognition.

original: de'i so na 'dug pa nyid mi snang ba la sogs pa yin na de bzhin du dmigs pa la sogs par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir te /
analyzed: de'i so na 'dug pa nyid mi snang ba la sogs pa yin na de bzhin du dmigs pa la sogs par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir te /
translated: If it is the very thing that exists that does not appear, etc., then it follows that it is perceived, etc.

original: de lta bas na yang dag par na mi snang ba'am dus su @134b 'pho ba 'ga' yang med do //
analyzed: de lta bas na yang dag par na mi snang ba'am dus su @134b 'pho ba 'ga' yang med do //
translated: Therefore, in reality, there is no non-appearance or transference at any time.

original: mi dmigs pa'i bdag nyid yin na ni dngos po de nyid ma yin te /
analyzed: mi dmigs pa'i bdag nyid yin na ni dngos po de nyid ma yin te /
translated: If it is the nature of non-apprehension, that thing itself is not,

original: de nyid ni gzhan nyid yin par mi 'thad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de nyid ni gzhan nyid yin par mi 'thad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is not tenable that that itself is other.

original: de lta ma yin na thams cad la tha dad pa med par thal bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: de lta ma yin na thams cad la tha dad pa med par thal bar 'gyur te /
translated: Otherwise, it would follow, absurdly, that there would be no difference between anything.

original: ha cang spros pas chog go //
analyzed: ha cang spros pas chog go //
translated: Enough of this extensive elaboration.

original: rgyu des zhes bya ba ni sngon gyi mtha' la sogs par theg pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: rgyu des zhes bya ba ni sngon gyi mtha' la sogs par theg pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir te /
translated: The reason is that the vehicle is not apprehended in the past, etc.

original: rnam pa thams cad du mi dmigs pa nyid mya ngan las 'das par tha snyad gdags pa'i rgyu yin no snyam du dgongs pa yin no //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad du mi dmigs pa nyid mya ngan las 'das par tha snyad gdags pa'i rgyu yin no snyam du dgongs pa yin no //
translated: The very non-apprehension in any way whatsoever is the reason for the designation of nirvana.

original: theg pa 'di'i sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs so zhes bya ba la sogs pa gang gsungs pa yin te /
analyzed: theg pa 'di'i sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs so zhes bya ba la sogs pa gang gsungs pa yin te /
translated: The sutra says, The beginning of this vehicle is not perceived.

original: de lta bu ni mtha' las 'das par nges par 'byung ba'i sgrub pa yin no //
analyzed: de lta bu ni mtha' las 'das par nges par 'byung ba'i sgrub pa yin no //
translated: This is the practice of the transcendence of the extremes.

original: gal te re zhig byang chub sems dpa' yang yod la de'i sems bskyed pa la sogs pa'i khyad par kho na yang theg pa chen po la sogs pa yin par 'gyur ba ma yin nam zhes na /
analyzed: gal te re zhig byang chub sems dpa' yang yod la de'i sems bskyed pa la sogs pa'i khyad par kho na yang theg pa chen po la sogs pa yin par 'gyur ba ma yin nam zhes na /
translated: If one says, But isn't the bodhisattva also existent, and isn't the vehicle the distinctions of his generation of the mind, etc.?

original: de'i phyir sngon gyi mtha' dang / zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: de'i phyir sngon gyi mtha' dang / zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: Therefore, it is said, the beginning, etc.

original: sngon gyi mtha' ni so so'i skye bo'i gnas skabs so /
analyzed: sngon gyi mtha' ni so so'i skye bo'i gnas skabs so /
translated: The beginning is the stage of ordinary beings.

original: phyi ma'i mtha'i ni mi slob pa'o //
analyzed: phyi ma'i mtha'i ni mi slob pa'o //
translated: The end is the stage of no-more-learning.

original: da ltar byung ba ni slob pa'o //
analyzed: da ltar byung ba ni slob pa'o //
translated: The present is the stage of learning.

original: yang ni sngon gyi mtha' la sogs pa ni spyir 'das la sogs pa'i dus yin te /
analyzed: yang ni sngon gyi mtha' la sogs pa ni spyir 'das la sogs pa'i dus yin te /
translated: Or, the beginning, etc. are in general the past, etc. times,

original: der byang chub sems dpa' gang zag la sogs pa'i bdag nyid du mi dmigs zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: der byang chub sems dpa' gang zag la sogs pa'i bdag nyid du mi dmigs zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: and it is said that the bodhisattva is not perceived as having the nature of a person, etc.

original: de nyid bstan pa'i phyir dus gsum dag pa zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: de nyid bstan pa'i phyir dus gsum dag pa zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: In order to demonstrate that, he says, ‚Äúthe three times are pure.‚Äù

original: med pa la kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: med pa la kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because there is no affliction in the non-existent.

original: de lta bu ni thob par byed pa bkag pa yin no //
analyzed: de lta bu ni thob par byed pa bkag pa yin no //
translated: That is the refutation of the agent of attainment.

original: 'dus ma byas zhes bya ba ni gong nas gong ma'i gnas skabs kyi ngo bo nyid du ma bsgrubs pas te /
analyzed: 'dus ma byas zhes bya ba ni gong nas gong ma'i gnas skabs kyi ngo bo nyid du ma bsgrubs pas te /
translated: ‚ÄúUnconditioned‚Äù means not established as the nature of a higher state.

original: de lta bu ni thob par bya ba bkag pa yin no //
analyzed: de lta bu ni thob par bya ba bkag pa yin no //
translated: That is the refutation of the object of attainment.

original: spros med ces bya ba thob par dmigs pa'i spros pa med pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: spros med ces bya ba thob par dmigs pa'i spros pa med pa'i phyir te /
translated: ‚ÄúFree from conceptual elaboration‚Äù means free from the conceptual elaboration of the object of attainment.

original: de lta bu ni 'thob pa bkag pa yin no //
analyzed: de lta bu ni 'thob pa bkag pa yin no //
translated: That is the refutation of attainment.

original: 'thob par byed pa la sogs pa mi dmigs pa de nyid sgrib pa med pa yin pa'i phyir nges par 'byung ba'i mchog yin no //
analyzed: 'thob par byed pa la sogs pa mi dmigs pa de nyid sgrib pa med pa yin pa'i phyir nges par 'byung ba'i mchog yin no //
translated: That very non-apprehension of the agent of attainment, etc. is the supreme liberation because it is the absence of obscuration.

original: 'di ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa de lta bu ni thob pa'i nges par 'byung ba'i sgrub pa yin no //
analyzed: 'di ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa de lta bu ni thob pa'i nges par 'byung ba'i sgrub pa yin no //
translated: ‚ÄúThis‚Äù and so on refers to the establishment of the liberation of attainment.

original: mi dmigs pa kho na lhur byas na thabs dang bral bas nam zhig rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: mi dmigs pa kho na lhur byas na thabs dang bral bas nam zhig rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur zhe na /
translated: If one makes non-apprehension the sole emphasis, one is devoid of means. How then can one attain the knowledge of all modes?

original: gang @135a * //üîΩgi zhes bya ba la sogs pa sa smos so //
analyzed: gang @135a * // gi zhes bya ba la sogs pa sa smos so //
translated: He saysüîΩin order to show that the knowledge of all modes is not attained by means of non-apprehension alone.

original: tshe zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni brdar btags pa tsam du zad pa nyid du bstan pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: tshe zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni brdar btags pa tsam du zad pa nyid du bstan pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The words ‚Äúlife‚Äù and so on are merely conventional designations.

original: sems can 'du shes med ces bya ba ni sems can du mngon par zhen pa dang ldan pa la ni snying brtse ba chen po med de /
analyzed: sems can 'du shes med ces bya ba ni sems can du mngon par zhen pa dang ldan pa la ni snying brtse ba chen po med de /
translated: The words ‚Äúno perception of sentient beings‚Äù mean that there is no great compassion for those who are attached to the notion of a sentient being.

original: de ni kun tu rmongs pa'i gnyen po yin pa'i phyir ro snyam du dgongs pa yin no //
analyzed: de ni kun tu rmongs pa'i gnyen po yin pa'i phyir ro snyam du dgongs pa yin no //
translated: The idea is that this is the antidote to complete delusion.

original: de bstan pa'i phyir 'di ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: de bstan pa'i phyir 'di ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: In order to demonstrate that, he says, ‚ÄúThis is not the antidote to the obscurations,‚Äù and so on.

original: sems can du dmigs pa ni sgrib pa'i gnyen po ma yin te phyin ci log gi ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sems can du dmigs pa ni sgrib pa'i gnyen po ma yin te phyin ci log gi ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The perception of a sentient being is not the antidote to the obscurations, because it has the nature of error.

original: gal te zhes bya ba la sogs pa la sems can dang sdug bsngal du shes pa nyid sdug bsngal spang snyam zhes bya ba la sogs pas gsal bar byed do //
analyzed: gal te zhes bya ba la sogs pa la sems can dang sdug bsngal du shes pa nyid sdug bsngal spang snyam zhes bya ba la sogs pas gsal bar byed do //
translated: If one thinks, I will eliminate suffering, etc. , he makes clear the knowledge of sentient beings and suffering.

original: yongs rtog ces bya ba ni rang dang gzhan dag tu mngon par zhen pa'o //
analyzed: yongs rtog ces bya ba ni rang dang gzhan dag tu mngon par zhen pa'o //
translated: Imagination refers to the notional attachment to self and others.

original: lhag ma ni don go bar zad do //
analyzed: lhag ma ni don go bar zad do //
translated: The rest is selfevident.

original: thabs dang shes rab kyi rang gi ngo bo phyin ci ma logs par bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: thabs dang shes rab kyi rang gi ngo bo phyin ci ma logs par bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: In order to correctly demonstrate the intrinsic reality of means and insight, he says:

original: bdag ci 'dra bar zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
analyzed: bdag ci 'dra bar zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
translated: Just as I am, etc.

original: de 'drar sems can thams cad shes zhes bya ba ni bdag nyid la bzhin du sems can thams cad la yang snying brtse bas phan pa dang bde ba skyed par zhugs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de 'drar sems can thams cad shes zhes bya ba ni bdag nyid la bzhin du sems can thams cad la yang snying brtse bas phan pa dang bde ba skyed par zhugs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Just so, one should know all sentient beings, because one is engaged in generating benefit and happiness through compassion, just as with oneself.

original: de 'drar chos kun shes zhes bya ba ni shes rab kyi gzhan gyis kun rtags pa'i sems can bzhin du chos thams cad stong pa nyid du rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de 'drar chos kun shes zhes bya ba ni shes rab kyi gzhan gyis kun rtags pa'i sems can bzhin du chos thams cad stong pa nyid du rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Just so, one should know all things, because one realizes that all things are empty, just as one realizes the imagination of what is unreal in the case of sentient beings.

original: de bstan pa'i phyir skye ba med dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te don go bar zad do //
analyzed: de bstan pa'i phyir skye ba med dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te don go bar zad do //
translated: In order to demonstrate that, he says, ‚Äúnon-arising, etc.‚Äù The meaning is self-evident.

original: de lta bu ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung ba'i sgrub pa yin no //
analyzed: de lta bu ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung ba'i sgrub pa yin no //
translated: Such is the practice of the perfection of wisdom that leads to the realization of omniscience.

original: yang ci'i phyir skye ba la sogs par rtog pa las 'das pa kho na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: yang ci'i phyir skye ba la sogs par rtog pa las 'das pa kho na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin zhe na /
translated: Again, why is it that the perfection of wisdom is just the transcendence of the conceptualization of arising, etc.?

original: 'jig rten dag na chos ming ji snyed ces bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
analyzed: 'jig rten dag na chos ming ji snyed ces bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
translated: He says, ‚ÄúWhatever the names in the world, etc.‚Äù

original: kun la skye ba zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten gyi tha snyad kyis bdag gis byas pa'i chos thams cad la skye ba'o //
analyzed: kun la skye ba zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten gyi tha snyad kyis bdag gis byas pa'i chos thams cad la skye ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúArising in all‚Äù means arising in all things that are said to be produced by oneself through worldly convention.

original: yang dag 'das pa ni 'gag pa'o //
analyzed: yang dag 'das pa ni 'gag pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúTranscending reality‚Äù means cessation.

original: spangs nas zhes bya ba ni de gnyis yongs su spangs nas so //
analyzed: spangs nas zhes bya ba ni de gnyis yongs su spangs nas so //
translated: ‚ÄúHaving abandoned‚Äù means having completely abandoned those two.

original: 'di med ces bya ba ni nyams pa med pa ste phyin ci log rnams kyis zil gyis mi non pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'di med ces bya ba ni nyams pa med pa ste phyin ci log rnams kyis zil gyis mi non pa'i phyir ro //
translated: ‚ÄúWithout this‚Äù means without loss, because one is not overcome by erroneous inversion.

original: de'i phyir ye shes 'di ni dam pa yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir ye shes 'di ni dam pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, this wisdom is the highest.

original: @135b de las gzhan med ces bya ba ni 'di ltar 'di'i gong na ye shes phyin ci ma log pa gzhan med do zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //üîΩde lta bas na ye shes 'di kho na skye ba la sogs pa'i rtog pa'i dri ma dang bral ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin gyi gzhan ni ma yin te /
analyzed: @135b de las gzhan med ces bya ba ni 'di ltar 'di'i gong na ye shes phyin ci ma log pa gzhan med do zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // de lta bas na ye shes 'di kho na skye ba la sogs pa'i rtog pa'i dri ma dang bral ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin gyi gzhan ni ma yin te /
translated: ‚ÄúThere is no other‚Äù means that there is no other unmistaken intuition above this.

original: de ni dam pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ni dam pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Therefore, this intuition alone is the perfection of wisdom, because it is free from the stain of the conceptualization of origination, etc., but not the other, because that is not ultimate.

original: de'i phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go bar sla'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go bar sla'o //
translated: ‚ÄúTherefore‚Äù and so on is easy to understand.

original: de la 'dir the tshom med pa'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid la gnas pa bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de la 'dir the tshom med pa'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid la gnas pa bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: In order to demonstrate the supramundane path, free from doubt, and the equality of all things,

original: de ltar spyod ces bya ba la sogs pa mos so //
analyzed: de ltar spyod ces bya ba la sogs pa mos so //
translated: he says, ‚ÄúThus, the wise one, etc.‚Äù

original: shes rab ldan zhes bya ba ni shes rab can no //
analyzed: shes rab ldan zhes bya ba ni shes rab can no //
translated: ‚ÄúEndowed with wisdom‚Äù means possessing wisdom.

original: mnyam pa nyid la gnas pa nyid bstan pa'i phyir rang bzhin zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te don go bar zad do //
analyzed: mnyam pa nyid la gnas pa nyid bstan pa'i phyir rang bzhin zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te don go bar zad do //
translated: In order to demonstrate the very state of equality, he says, ‚ÄúIn his own nature, etc.‚Äù The meaning is evident.

original: de lta bu ni lam gyi nges par 'byung ba'i sgrub pa yin no //
analyzed: de lta bu ni lam gyi nges par 'byung ba'i sgrub pa yin no //
translated: Such is the practice of the definite emergence of the path.

original: de la 'dir go rims ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: de la 'dir go rims ni 'di yin te /
translated: Here is the sequence:

original: byang chub tu sems bskyed pa yang dag pa'i gdams ngag bsgrubs pas nyan thos la sogs pa dang thun mong ma yin pa'i nges par 'byed pa'i cha dag skyed par byed do //
analyzed: byang chub tu sems bskyed pa yang dag pa'i gdams ngag bsgrubs pas nyan thos la sogs pa dang thun mong ma yin pa'i nges par 'byed pa'i cha dag skyed par byed do //
translated: Having generated the Thought of Enlightenment, one produces the factors of definite emergence that are not shared with the Sravakas, etc., by accomplishing the right instructions.

original: thun mong ma yin pa sgrub pa de yang rten gang yin pa dang dmigs pa gang yin pa dang / ched du bya ba gang yin pa nas rnam pa'i bar dang ldan pa yin no //
analyzed: thun mong ma yin pa sgrub pa de yang rten gang yin pa dang dmigs pa gang yin pa dang / ched du bya ba gang yin pa nas rnam pa'i bar dang ldan pa yin no //
translated: And that accomplishment which is not shared is endowed with a basis, an objective, a purpose, and a form.

original: de la 'dir sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes gang yin pa 'di ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: de la 'dir sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes gang yin pa 'di ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yin no //
translated: Here, the unobstructed intuition is the knowledge of all things.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bshad zin to //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bshad zin to //
translated: The knowledge of all things has been explained.

translated: Its cause is the knowledge of the path itself, and that, by the distinctions of the stages of heat and so on, is the complete ripening of self and other, as appropriate.üîΩThe path of the solitary realizers and the disciples,

analyzed: slob ma bse ru'i lam gang dang // 'di dang gzhan pa'i yon tan gyis //
translated: and by the qualities of this and other paths,üîΩthe path of seeing is of great benefit.

analyzed: phan yon che ba mthong ba'i lam //

original: rang sangs rgyas dang rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis smos pa ni gang zhig mchog la yang mi gnas pa de ji ltar gzhan la gnas par 'gyur zhes shes par bya ba'i phyir te /

original: yang ci'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi sa la yang mi gnas she na /
analyzed: yang ci'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi sa la yang mi gnas she na /

original: de'i phyir ji ltar 'dren pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //

original: 'dus byas ni 'khor ba'o //

original: 'di'i dbang du mdzad nas /

original: gzugs ni shes rab ma yin zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'byung ba yin no //
analyzed: gzugs ni shes rab ma yin zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'byung ba yin no //

original: de la gzugs la sogs pa dang shes rab de'i bdag nyid du mi dmigs pa ni sdug bsngal la chos shes pa'i bzod pa yin no //
analyzed: de la gzugs la sogs pa dang shes rab de'i bdag nyid du mi dmigs pa ni sdug bsngal la chos shes pa'i bzod pa yin no //
translated: The non-apprehension of form, etc. and that wisdom as identical is the acquiescence in the knowledge of the Teaching with regard to suffering.

original: rten dang brten pa'i dngos por mi dmigs pa ni sdug bsngal la chos shes pa yin no //
analyzed: rten dang brten pa'i dngos por mi dmigs pa ni sdug bsngal la chos shes pa yin no //
translated: The non-apprehension of the relationship of support and supported is the knowledge of the Teaching with regard to suffering.

original: ji ltar de'i bdag nyid ma yin zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar de'i bdag nyid ma yin zhe na /

original: 'di ltar gzugs la sogs pa dang shes rab 'di ni nam mkha'i khams dang mtshungs te /
analyzed: 'di ltar gzugs la sogs pa dang shes rab 'di ni nam mkha'i khams dang mtshungs te /
translated: In this way, form, etc. and that wisdom are similar to the element of space,

original: ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because they are without intrinsic reality.

original: de lta bu ni sdug bsngal la rjes su shes pa'i bzod pa yin no //
analyzed: de lta bu ni sdug bsngal la rjes su shes pa'i bzod pa yin no //
translated: That is the acquiescence in the subsequent knowledge with regard to suffering.

original: ji ltar rten dang brten pa'i dngos po ma yin zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar rten dang brten pa'i dngos po ma yin zhe na /
translated: How is it not the relationship of support and supported?

original: 'di ltar yod pa ma yin pas tha dad med de /
analyzed: 'di ltar yod pa ma yin pas tha dad med de /
translated: In this way, it is not different, because it does not exist.

original: de ni tha dad pa la brten pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ni tha dad pa la brten pa'i phyir ro //
translated: That is because the difference is based on that.

original: de lta bu ni sdug bsngal la rjes su shes pa yin no //
analyzed: de lta bu ni sdug bsngal la rjes su shes pa yin no //
translated: That is the subsequent knowledge with regard to suffering.

original: de bzhin du bden pa gzhan dag la yang bzod pa dang shes pa rtogs pa ci rigs par sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du bden pa gzhan dag la yang bzod pa dang shes pa rtogs pa ci rigs par sbyar bar bya'o //

original: de lta yin na 'khrul pa tsam yang dag las 'byung zhe na /
analyzed: de lta yin na 'khrul pa tsam yang dag las 'byung zhe na /
translated: If that is so, then even mere error arises from the real?

original: kun 'byung ba la dmigs pa'i sgo nas ni dmigs pa rnams kyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: kun 'byung ba la dmigs pa'i sgo nas ni dmigs pa rnams kyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: In response, he says, ‚ÄúFrom the perspective of the focal object of origin, it is the nature of the focal object and so on.‚Äù

analyzed: dmigs pa ni gzung ba'i rnam par bgrang ba gzugs la sogs pa'o //
translated: The focal object is the enumeration of the apprehended, such as form and so on.

original: de'i rang bzhin ni rigs mthun pa'i rnam pa dus phyis 'byung ba skyed @138a * //üîΩpar byed pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: de'i rang bzhin ni rigs mthun pa'i rnam pa dus phyis 'byung ba skyed @138a * // par byed pa nyid yin no //
translated: Its nature is the capacity to generate subsequent states of the same type.

original: pha mtha' med ces bya ba ni rigs mthun pa rab tu skye ba ste rgyun chad pa med pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: pha mtha' med ces bya ba ni rigs mthun pa rab tu skye ba ste rgyun chad pa med pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: It is without end means that it is the arising of states of the same type, which is to say that it is uninterrupted.

original: sems can ni 'dzin pa'i rnam par kun tu brtags pa'i phung po la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: sems can ni 'dzin pa'i rnam par kun tu brtags pa'i phung po la sogs pa'o //
translated: Sentient beings are the aggregates and so on that are imagined to be the apprehender.

original: lhag ma rnams ni snga ma bzhin no //
analyzed: lhag ma rnams ni snga ma bzhin no //
translated: The rest is as before.

original: 'o na ni nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ni nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa ma yin no zhe na /
translated: Well then, it is not similar to space?

original: nam mkha' zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: nam mkha' zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: The passage beginning with ‚Äúspace‚Äù indicates that

analyzed: yang dag par na chos thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid kyis dben par mtshan nyid gcig pa'i phyir ro snyam du dgongs pa yin no //
translated: the ultimate is the characteristic of all phenomena, because they are the same in being devoid of intrinsic identity.

original: de ltar yul mtha' med pa'i phyir shes rab kyang mtha' med pas shes rab ces bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
analyzed: de ltar yul mtha' med pa'i phyir shes rab kyang mtha' med pas shes rab ces bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
translated: Thus, because the object is limitless, wisdom is also limitless.

original: de ltar rgyu dang bcas par 'byung ba'i sdug bsngal ji ltar ldog ce na /
analyzed: de ltar rgyu dang bcas par 'byung ba'i sdug bsngal ji ltar ldog ce na /
translated: How is suffering, which arises with a cause, stopped?

original: 'gog pa la dmigs pa'i sgo nas ni 'du shes zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: 'gog pa la dmigs pa'i sgo nas ni 'du shes zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: The passage beginning with ‚Äúperception‚Äù indicates that it is by means of the focus on cessation.

original: 'du shes ni 'dzin pa la sogs pa'i rnam par rtog pa yin no //
analyzed: 'du shes ni 'dzin pa la sogs pa'i rnam par rtog pa yin no //
translated: Perception is the conceptualization of grasping and so on.

original: tshu rol yin zhes bya ba ni kun nas nyon mongs pa'i mtshan nyid kun 'byung ba yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: tshu rol yin zhes bya ba ni kun nas nyon mongs pa'i mtshan nyid kun 'byung ba yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: This shore is the characteristic of affliction, that is, the origin.

original: rnam par bshig nas zhes bya ba ni bor nas so //
analyzed: rnam par bshig nas zhes bya ba ni bor nas so //
translated: Having destroyed it means having abandoned it.

original: pha rol zhes bya ba ni rnam par byang ba'o //
analyzed: pha rol zhes bya ba ni rnam par byang ba'o //
translated: The other shore is purification.

original: 'di skad du sdug bsngal gyi rgyu ni phyin ci log ma gtogs pa gzhan med la de yang gnyen po mngon du gyur pas bral ba la rnam par byang ba zhes grags te /

translated: It is well known that purification is the elimination of error.

original: de la gnas pa rnams kho na ston pa'i thugs dang mthun par 'jug pa'i phyir ro zhes bshad pa yin no //
analyzed: de la gnas pa rnams kho na ston pa'i thugs dang mthun par 'jug pa'i phyir ro zhes bshad pa yin no //
translated: Those who abide in that are said to be in accord with the mind of the Teacher, because they engage in the practice of the Dharma.

original: gang dag ces bya ba la sogs pa'i tshig gi don ni go bar zad do //
analyzed: gang dag ces bya ba la sogs pa'i tshig gi don ni go bar zad do //
translated: The meaning of the words ‚Äúthose who‚Äù and so on is understood.

original: ji ltar na bdag la sogs par de nyid 'di shes pa tsam kun nas nyon mongs pa yin te /
analyzed: ji ltar na bdag la sogs par de nyid 'di shes pa tsam kun nas nyon mongs pa yin te /
translated: How is it that the mere knowledge of reality as ‚Äúself‚Äù and so on is a thorough affliction?

original: de ni 'du shes par bya ba'i gzhan gyi dbang du gyur pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: de ni 'du shes par bya ba'i gzhan gyi dbang du gyur pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: Because it is under the control of the other, the object of perception.

original: lam la dmigs pa'i sgo nas ni gal te zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
analyzed: lam la dmigs pa'i sgo nas ni gal te zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
translated: From the perspective of the object of the path, it is said, ‚ÄúIf one thinks‚Ä¶‚Äù and so on.

original: 'di skad du gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis sems can la sogs pa'i tha snyad dus mtha' yas pa zhig tu brjod par gyur kyang des kyang sems can la sogs pa rab tu 'grub par mi spyod de /
analyzed: 'di skad du gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis sems can la sogs pa'i tha snyad dus mtha' yas pa zhig tu brjod par gyur kyang des kyang sems can la sogs pa rab tu 'grub par mi spyod de /
translated: One might say this: ‚ÄúEven if the Lord had used the conventions of sentient beings and so forth for an infinite time, that would not establish sentient beings and so forth.

original: de las ma byung ba'i phyir dang de dang 'brel ba rab tu ma grub pa'i phyir ro zhes sngar bshad zin to zhes brjod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de las ma byung ba'i phyir dang de dang 'brel ba rab tu ma grub pa'i phyir ro zhes sngar bshad zin to zhes brjod par 'gyur ro //
translated: Because they do not arise from that and because their connection with that is not established,‚Äù as was explained earlier.

original: sems can la sogs pa skye ba med par rtogs pa de nyid @138b gnyen po phan yon che ba yin pas 'di ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: sems can la sogs pa skye ba med par rtogs pa de nyid @138b gnyen po phan yon che ba yin pas 'di ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: Since the realization that sentient beings and so forth are not produced is itself the great antidote and benefit, it says, ‚ÄúThis is the supreme antidote,‚Äù and so forth.

original: spyod pa de lta bu ni mthong ba dang tshe phyi ma'i yon tan skye ba'i rgyu yin no snyam du dgongs pa yin no //
analyzed: spyod pa de lta bu ni mthong ba dang tshe phyi ma'i yon tan skye ba'i rgyu yin no snyam du dgongs pa yin no //
translated: The thought is that such a practice is the cause for the qualities of the path of seeing and the next life to arise.

original: mthong ba'i lam bshad zin to /üîΩ// / bam po gsum pa /
analyzed: mthong ba'i lam bshad zin to / // / bam po gsum pa /
translated: The path of seeing has been explained.

original: 'di man chad ni bsgom pa'i lam byed pa dang bcas pa yin no //
analyzed: 'di man chad ni bsgom pa'i lam byed pa dang bcas pa yin no //
translated: From here on is the path of meditation with its function.

original: byed pa de yang rnam pa gsum ste /
analyzed: byed pa de yang rnam pa gsum ste /
translated: That function is threefold:

original: lung bstan pa thob pa'i byed pa de ni /
analyzed: lung bstan pa thob pa'i byed pa de ni /
translated: The function of attaining the prophecy isüîΩas stated in the passage beginning ‚ÄúWhen I am gone.

original: gang tshe nga ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'byung ba yin no //
analyzed: gang tshe nga ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'byung ba yin no //
translated: ‚ÄúWhen I say ‚ÄòI‚Äô and so on‚Äù is stated.üîΩ

original: 'di dang zhes bya ba ni bsgom pa'i lam gyis bsdus pa dang zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: 'di dang zhes bya ba ni bsgom pa'i lam gyis bsdus pa dang zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: ‚ÄúThis‚Äù refers to what is included in the path of cultivation.

original: mthun par smra 'gyur zhes bya ba ni gzhan du mi smra ba'i phyir te /
analyzed: mthun par smra 'gyur zhes bya ba ni gzhan du mi smra ba'i phyir te /
translated: ‚ÄúThey will speak in harmony‚Äù means that they will not speak in any other way,

original: mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa dang bcas pa 'di nyid lung bstan pa thob pa'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa dang bcas pa 'di nyid lung bstan pa thob pa'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because this very acceptance of the nonarising of things is the cause for attaining the prophecy.

original: lhag ma ni go sla'o //
analyzed: lhag ma ni go sla'o //
translated: The rest is easy to understand.

original: mi brdzi pa'i byed pa ni 'di 'dzin pa la sog pa la zhugs pa la dug la sogs pas mi tshugs pa yin pa'i phyir shes rab pha rol phyin pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //üîΩ'dzin pa ni tshig gi sgo nas mos pa yid la byed pas so //
analyzed: mi brdzi pa'i byed pa ni 'di 'dzin pa la sog pa la zhugs pa la dug la sogs pas mi tshugs pa yin pa'i phyir shes rab pha rol phyin pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so // 'dzin pa ni tshig gi sgo nas mos pa yid la byed pas so //
translated: The function of being invincible is stated in the passage beginning ‚ÄúThe perfection of wisdom‚Äù and so on, because those who are engaged in upholding this teaching cannot be harmed by poison and so on.üîΩUpholding it is done by means of attention to conviction through the medium of the words.

original: chub byed pa ni don gyi sgo nas de kho na dang mos pa yid la byed pa dag gis so //
analyzed: chub byed pa ni don gyi sgo nas de kho na dang mos pa yid la byed pa dag gis so //
translated: Mastering it is done by means of attention to conviction in reality through the medium of the meaning.

original: bar chad byed pa med pa'i byed pa ni 'dzin pa la sogs pa la bdud la sogs pas glags mi thod pa yin pa'i phyir bdud dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
analyzed: bar chad byed pa med pa'i byed pa ni 'dzin pa la sogs pa la bdud la sogs pas glags mi thod pa yin pa'i phyir bdud dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
translated: The performance that is free from obstacles is not vulnerable to Mara, etc. with regard to retention, etc. Therefore, he says, ‚ÄúMara, etc. cannot find an opportunity to assail him.

original: glags ni klan ka'o //
analyzed: glags ni klan ka'o //
translated: ‚Äù An opportunity is a pretext.

original: rnyed mi 'gyur zhes bya ba ni rnyed par mi 'gyur ba kho na'o zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: rnyed mi 'gyur zhes bya ba ni rnyed par mi 'gyur ba kho na'o zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: ‚ÄúCannot find‚Äù means that they cannot find at all, i.e., they cannot find any opportunity to assail him.

original: de la byed pa'i rim pa ni lung bstan pa yang dag par thob nas gzhan dag gis mi tshugs shing bar chad byed pa med pa ni byang chub sgrub par byed par byed do zhes bya ba yin no //

translated: The sequence of the performance is as follows: having attained the prediction, he is not vulnerable to others and is free from obstacles, and thus he performs the practice of enlightenment.

original: bsgom pa'i lam ni rnam pa gnyis te /
analyzed: bsgom pa'i lam ni rnam pa gnyis te /
translated: The path of meditative development is twofold:

original: dag pa 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten pas 'das pa'o //
analyzed: dag pa 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten pas 'das pa'o //
translated: mundane and supramundane.

original: de la dang po ni mos pa dang rjes su yi rang ba dang bsngo ba yid la byed pa'i mtshan nyid yin no //
analyzed: de la dang po ni mos pa dang rjes su yi rang ba dang bsngo ba yid la byed pa'i mtshan nyid yin no //
translated: Of these, the first is characterized by the mental attention to: conviction, rejoicing and dedication.

original: mos pa yang rnam pa gsum ste ;
analyzed: mos pa yang rnam pa gsum ste ;
translated: Conviction is threefold:

original: rang gi don gyi mos pa ni de yang mchod rten la mchod pa bas phul du byung ba tshad las 'das pa'i bsod nams nye bar sogs pa'i rgyu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i glegs bam 'dzin pa la sogs pa'i rten yin no //
analyzed: rang gi don gyi mos pa ni de yang mchod rten la mchod pa bas phul du byung ba tshad las 'das pa'i bsod nams nye bar sogs pa'i rgyu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i glegs bam 'dzin pa la sogs pa'i rten yin no //
translated: The interest in one's own aim is the support for the knowledge of the perfection of wisdom, which is the cause for the acquisition of the surpassing, immeasurable merit that comes from holding the book of the perfection of wisdom, surpassing the merit that comes from making offerings to the stupa.

original: mchod pa las phul du byung ba de yang 'brel ba'i sgo @139a * //
analyzed: mchod pa las phul du byung ba de yang 'brel ba'i sgo @139a * //
translated: That surpassing of the offering is by way of the connection.

original: nas ni / bde gshegs zhes bya ba la sogs pa gang gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: nas ni / bde gshegs zhes bya ba la sogs pa gang gsungs pa yin no //
translated: This is what is stated by the words the Sugata's relics and so on.

original: de ni rten gyi khyad par sgrub pa'i sgo nas ni /
analyzed: de ni rten gyi khyad par sgrub pa'i sgo nas ni /
translated: That is by way of establishing the difference in the support.

original: byas shing zhes bya ba gang 'byung ba yin te /
analyzed: byas shing zhes bya ba gang 'byung ba yin te /

original: rin po che sna bdun gyi mchod rten byas nas zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: rin po che sna bdun gyi mchod rten byas nas zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: Having made a stupa of the seven precious substances is to be supplied.

original: de la mang ba nyid kyi sgo nas ni de dag ces bya ba la sogs pa 'byung ba yin te /
analyzed: de la mang ba nyid kyi sgo nas ni de dag ces bya ba la sogs pa 'byung ba yin te /
translated: There, by way of the many, this is what is stated by the words those who and so on.

original: gang g'a'i bye ma snyed kyi zhes bya ba ni gang g'a'i klung gi bye ma dang mnyam zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: gang g'a'i bye ma snyed kyi zhes bya ba ni gang g'a'i klung gi bye ma dang mnyam zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: As many as there are grains of sand in the Ganges means equal to the number of grains of sand in the Ganges river.

original: yongs su rtag gzung zhing zhes bya ba ni yongs su rtag pa nye bar bzung nas te /
analyzed: yongs su rtag gzung zhing zhes bya ba ni yongs su rtag pa nye bar bzung nas te /
translated: Holding them dear means holding them dear as if they were one's own.

original: yang dag par na sems can de dag thams cad de lta bu'i mchod pa la sbyor ba mi sred pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yang dag par na sems can de dag thams cad de lta bu'i mchod pa la sbyor ba mi sred pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because, in reality, all those sentient beings do not need to be applied to such worship.

original: byed pa po mang po'i sgo nas ni sems can ji snyed pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'byung ba yin te bye ba zhes bya ba ni bye ba dag na yod pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: byed pa po mang po'i sgo nas ni sems can ji snyed pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'byung ba yin te bye ba zhes bya ba ni bye ba dag na yod pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: From the point of view of many agents, it says as many sentient beings as there are, and so on.  Ten million means existing in ten million places.

original: bar chad med par sbyor ba'i sgo nas ni /
analyzed: bar chad med par sbyor ba'i sgo nas ni /
translated: From the point of view of uninterrupted application,

analyzed: las gzhan mi byed ces bya 'byung ba yin te mchod pa byed ces bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: it says not doing any other work, and it should be connected with performing worship.

original: yo byad kyi khyad par gyi sgo nas ni /
analyzed: yo byad kyi khyad par gyi sgo nas ni /
translated: From the point of view of the special requisites,

original: lha'i me tog ces bya ba la sogs pa 'byung ba yin no //
analyzed: lha'i me tog ces bya ba la sogs pa 'byung ba yin no //
translated: it says divine flowers, and so on.

original: dus kyi khyad par gyi sgo nas ni /
analyzed: dus kyi khyad par gyi sgo nas ni /
translated: From the point of view of the special time,

original: bskal pa'am zhes bya ba 'byung ba yin no //
analyzed: bskal pa'am zhes bya ba 'byung ba yin no //
translated: it says for an eon and so on.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i glegs bam 'dzin pa la sogs pa ni rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi gtso bo'i rgyur gyur pa'i phyir de bas kyang chos mchog tu gyur pa'i phyir /

translated: Because of holding the Perfection of Wisdom book, etc., it is the cause of the chief of perfect enlightenments, and therefore it is the supreme Dharma.

original: gang zhig ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: gang zhig ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: Therefore, it is said, Whoever, etc.

analyzed: bsti stang byed gyur na zhes bya ba ni bsti stang byed par gyur na zhes bya ba yin no //
translated: If one should honor it, etc. means if one should honor it.

original: rang dang gzhan gyi don gyi mos pa ni de yang rang dang gzhan yongs su smin pa dang mthun pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rtogs pa'i yul can yin te /
analyzed: rang dang gzhan gyi don gyi mos pa ni de yang rang dang gzhan yongs su smin pa dang mthun pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rtogs pa'i yul can yin te /
translated: The aspiration for one's own and others' aims is the subject that is consistent with the full maturation of oneself and others, and the realization of the Perfection of Wisdom.

original: de'i dbang du mdzad nas /
analyzed: de'i dbang du mdzad nas /
translated: With reference to that,

original: rig sngags che zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: rig sngags che zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: it is said, the great knowledge-mantra, etc.

original: bcom ldan 'das ma rig sngags chen po nyid yin yang 'tshe ba thams cad zhi ba'i phyir ni sdug bsngal chos zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'byung ba yin no //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das ma rig sngags chen po nyid yin yang 'tshe ba thams cad zhi ba'i phyir ni sdug bsngal chos zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'byung ba yin no //
translated: Even though the Blessed Lady is the great knowledge-mantra, in order to pacify all calamities, the Dharma of suffering, etc., is mentioned.

translated: It is the wisdom of solitude because it is applied to the realization that all things are naturally nirvana. translated: they have no doubt about themselves because they realize that they are irreversible through possessing the Dharma of reasoning, they are unshakable because their realization is like Mount Meru, and they delight in the excellent Dharma because they give up their lives for it, thinking this is the true refuge.

original: phyin pa'i rgyu las byung ba'i chos kyi sbyin pa rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos nas khams gsum pa'i bsod nams thams cad par mchog yin pa'i phyir /

analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig ces bya ba la sogs pa 'byung ba yin no //

original: chen po ni de ltar mchog tu gyur pa'i bsod nams kyi tshogs la yang bsog pa la sogs par rtog pas zag pa med pa'i bsod nams gzhal du med pa yongs su 'dzin pa yin pa'i phyir /

analyzed: bsod nams de yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'byung ba yin te / gsog ni gzugs su rung ba'i mtshan nyid la sogs pas dben pa'i phyir ro //

original: stong pa ni sdug bsngal la sogs pa'i rnam pas stong ba'i pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: stong pa ni sdug bsngal la sogs pa'i rnam pas stong ba'i pa'i phyir ro //

original: gso ba ni mtshan ma med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gso ba ni mtshan ma med pa'i phyir ro //

original: ya ma brla ni rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ya ma brla ni rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i phyir ro //

analyzed: snying po med pa ni 'dzin pa la sogs pa dang bral ba'i phyir ro //

analyzed: gzhan du med na zhes bya ba ni rtod pa nyid du rog cig pas gzhal bya la sogs pa'i sgra mi 'jug pa'i phyir ro //

analyzed: de lta na de kho na nyid ni rnam par rtog pa med pa'i phyir gzhal du med pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tha snyad kyang mi 'jug pa ma yin nam /

original: de lta na yang brjod pa tsam ni gnyen po ma yin pa'i phyir mi mthun pa dang gnyen po dag nyams pa dang 'phel ba med par thal bar 'gyur pas /
analyzed: de lta na yang brjod pa tsam ni gnyen po ma yin pa'i phyir mi mthun pa dang gnyen po dag nyams pa dang 'phel ba med par thal bar 'gyur pas /

original: sangs rgyas kyis bshad ces bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyis bshad ces bya ba la sogs pa smos te /

analyzed: rab tu bstan pa ni the tshom spong ba'i sgo nas so //

analyzed: bskal pa bye ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos pa ni gnyen po ma yin pa goms pa ni yun ring mo zhig lon du zin kyang don med par rab tu bstan pa'i phyir ro //

analyzed: de bzhin du pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa'i chos kyang gnyen po ma yin te /

analyzed: de dag kyang sbyor pa'i dus na rnam par rtog pa'i mtshan nyid yin pa'i phyir /

analyzed: rgyal ba rnams kyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //

analyzed: de'i lan gdab par yongs bsngo zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /

original: de ltar rlom sems thams cad las 'das pa'i yongs @155b su bsngo ba nyid rnam par mi rtog pa'i go 'phang rab tu skye ba'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir ro snyam du dgongs pa yin no //

analyzed: sems dang po bskyed pas rab tu phye ba'i yongs su bsngo ba ni byang chub pa'i rgyu ma yin te /

analyzed: de ni de'i tshe na 'gags nas yin ring zhig lon pa'i phyir ro //

original: bar chad med pa'i lam gyi mtshan nyid kyang ma yin te /
analyzed: bar chad med pa'i lam gyi mtshan nyid kyang ma yin te /

analyzed: sems dang po la sogs pa don med par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //

analyzed: de 'bru mar gyi snying po bsregs pa'i tshul gyis lan gdab pa'i phyir 'bru mar gyi snying po zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //

analyzed: 'bru mar gyi snying po smos pa ni sreg pa'i rim pa rtogs par bya ba'i rim pa rtogs par bya ba'i phyir te /

analyzed: gzhan la ni myur du tshig pa srid pas rim pa yang brtag dka' bar 'gyur ro //

original: 'di la dgongs pa ni dper na me lce phrad pa dang po kho nas kyang snying po ril gyis mi sreg la dang po la sogs pa med na phyi ma nyid kyang med pa'i phyir phyi ma kho nas kyang ma yin pa ltar byang chub tu sems bskyedüîΩpa'i rim pa yang de dang 'dra zhes bya byin no //

translated: The idea here is that just as the first contact of the flame does not burn up the entire torch, and if there were no first contact, etc., there would be no later ones, so it is with the stages of generating the enlightenment mind.

analyzed: de bstan pa'i phyir dang po'i sems kyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /

analyzed: zhi ba ni byang chub ces bya bar skabs dang sbyar ro //

analyzed: brgyad pas zhes bya ba lhag ma yin no //

analyzed: dngos su'o snyam du dgongs pa yin no //

original: rim gyis @156a * //
analyzed: rim gyis @156a * //

original: bar chad byed pa las yang dag par 'da' ba'i thabs ni sgyu rtsal la mkhas pa'i skyes bu bzhin du byams pas sems can gyi khams la dmigs te zhugs pa bdud la sogs pa bar chad byed pa las yang dag par 'da' ba'i phyir /

translated: The method of transcending the obstacles is like a person skilled in the arts, who, through love, takes up the observation of the realm of sentient beings, and so transcends the obstacles of Mara, etc.

original: dper na skyes bu zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i bya ba yin te /
analyzed: dper na skyes bu zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i bya ba yin te /
translated: For example, a person, etc.

original: brtson byas zhes bya ba ni goms par byas pa'o //
analyzed: brtson byas zhes bya ba ni goms par byas pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúHaving made an effort‚Äù means having become accustomed to it.

original: sgyu ma sgrub ces bya ba ni gcig pus kyang 'khor du ma ston pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sgyu ma sgrub ces bya ba ni gcig pus kyang 'khor du ma ston pa'i phyir ro //
translated: ‚ÄúHaving created an illusion‚Äù means that even alone he can manifest a retinue.

original: 'gro don rab tu 'dod pa zhes bya ba ni snying rje med pa ni nus su zin kyang gzhan yongs su bskyab pa la mi 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'gro don rab tu 'dod pa zhes bya ba ni snying rje med pa ni nus su zin kyang gzhan yongs su bskyab pa la mi 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
translated: ‚ÄúHaving a strong desire for the welfare of beings‚Äù means that even though he is able, he does not engage in the protection of others out of compassion.

original: de yis zhes bya ba ni ji skad bshad pa'i skyes bus so //
analyzed: de yis zhes bya ba ni ji skad bshad pa'i skyes bus so //
translated: ‚ÄúBy that‚Äù refers to the person as previously described.

original: kun du zhes bya ba ni thams cad la ste sems can gyi khams zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: kun du zhes bya ba ni thams cad la ste sems can gyi khams zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: ‚ÄúEverywhere‚Äù means in all places, i.e., in the realm of sentient beings.

original: sa gnyis las zhes bya ba ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa dag las te /
analyzed: sa gnyis las zhes bya ba ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa dag las te /
translated: ‚ÄúBeyond the two stages‚Äù means beyond the stages of the Sravakas and Pratyekabuddhas.

original: rab 'das nas zhes bya bar skabs dang sbyar ro //
analyzed: rab 'das nas zhes bya bar skabs dang sbyar ro //
translated: ‚ÄúHaving gone beyond‚Äù is supplied in the sentence.

original: byang chub rig mi byed ces bya ba ni tshogs ma rdzogs pa'am de la yang mngon par zhen pa med pa'i phyir ro snyam du dgongs pa yin no //
analyzed: byang chub rig mi byed ces bya ba ni tshogs ma rdzogs pa'am de la yang mngon par zhen pa med pa'i phyir ro snyam du dgongs pa yin no //
translated: ‚ÄúEnlightenment is not known‚Äù means that the accumulations are not complete, or that there is no attachment to them.

original: thun mong ma yin pa'i thabs ni 'gro ba'i las kyi dbang gis nam mkha' la snod kyi 'jig rten gnas pa bzhin du sems can yongs su mi gtong ba'i bsam pas shin tu bya dka' ba'i stong pa nyid la gnas pa'i phyir mkha' la zhes bya ba la
analyzed: thun mong ma yin pa'i thabs ni 'gro ba'i las kyi dbang gis nam mkha' la snod kyi 'jig rten gnas pa bzhin du sems can yongs su mi gtong ba'i bsam pas shin tu bya dka' ba'i stong pa nyid la gnas pa'i phyir mkha' la zhes bya ba la
translated: The uncommon method is that, like the world of the vessels existing in space by the power of the karma of beings, by the intention of not abandoning sentient beings, one abides in emptiness, which is very difficult to do.

original: @157a * // sogs pa 'byung ba yin te /
analyzed: @157a * // sogs pa 'byung ba yin te /
translated: Therefore, ‚Äúin space‚Äù and so forth is stated.

original: de la zhes bya ba ni chu'i phung po de la'o //
analyzed: de la zhes bya ba ni chu'i phung po de la'o //
translated: ‚ÄúIn that‚Äù refers to that mass of water.

original: 'gro ba zhes bya ba ni rten zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: 'gro ba zhes bya ba ni rten zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: ‚ÄúGoing‚Äù is to be connected with ‚Äúsupport.‚Äù

original: las la spyod pa'i rgyu zhes bya ba ni snod kyi 'jig rten med pa las kyi 'bras bu la spyod par mi nus pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: las la spyod pa'i rgyu zhes bya ba ni snod kyi 'jig rten med pa las kyi 'bras bu la spyod par mi nus pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: ‚ÄúThe cause of the performance of action‚Äù means that without the physical world, one is not able to perform the action that is the result of karma.

original: bya ba zhes bya ba ni sbyin pa la sogs pa bsdu ba'i dngos po'i mtshan nyid dag go //
analyzed: bya ba zhes bya ba ni sbyin pa la sogs pa bsdu ba'i dngos po'i mtshan nyid dag go //
translated: ‚ÄúAction‚Äù refers to generosity and so forth, which are characterized by the means of gathering disciples.

original: bya ba ston pa gang la brten sems can rnams kyis shes pa'i ched du smon lam gang yin pa de kho na yod pa zhes bya bar tshig rnam par sbyar ro //
analyzed: bya ba ston pa gang la brten sems can rnams kyis shes pa'i ched du smon lam gang yin pa de kho na yod pa zhes bya bar tshig rnam par sbyar ro //
translated: The prayer is for the existence of that very thing which is the basis for the teaching of action, in order that sentient beings may know it.

original: gnas pa med ces bya ba ni stong pa nyid ni nam mkha' bzhin du rten ma yin pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: gnas pa med ces bya ba ni stong pa nyid ni nam mkha' bzhin du rten ma yin pa'i phyir te /
translated: ‚ÄúWithout support‚Äù means that emptiness, like space, is not a support.

original: 'on kyang sa gzhan du mi ltung ngo snyam du dgongs pa yin no //
analyzed: 'on kyang sa gzhan du mi ltung ngo snyam du dgongs pa yin no //
translated: However, it is the intention that it does not fall to another stage.

original: mtshan ma med pa'i thabs ni stong pa nyid la gnas pa mtshan ma dang mtshan ma med pa dag tu mi 'dzin pa'i phyir gang gi tshe na zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'byung ba yin te /
analyzed: mtshan ma med pa'i thabs ni stong pa nyid la gnas pa mtshan ma dang mtshan ma med pa dag tu mi 'dzin pa'i phyir gang gi tshe na zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'byung ba yin te /
translated: The method of signlessness is when one does not apprehend signs and signlessness as abiding in emptiness.

original: mtshan ma la mngon par ma zhen pa'i phyir zhi la spyod pa yin no //
analyzed: mtshan ma la mngon par ma zhen pa'i phyir zhi la spyod pa yin no //
translated: He practices peace because he does not cling to signs.

original: mtshan ma med pa la mngon par ma zhen pa'i phyir rab zhi spyod pa yin no //
analyzed: mtshan ma med pa la mngon par ma zhen pa'i phyir rab zhi spyod pa yin no //
translated: He practices complete peace because he does not cling to signlessness.

original: mi gnas par gnas pa'i thabs ni nam mkha' dang sa dag la bya bzhin du zhi ba dang mtshan ma dag la mi gnas par sems can gyi don bya ba la gnas pa'i phyir par snang zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'byung ba yin te /
analyzed: mi gnas par gnas pa'i thabs ni nam mkha' dang sa dag la bya bzhin du zhi ba dang mtshan ma dag la mi gnas par sems can gyi don bya ba la gnas pa'i phyir par snang zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'byung ba yin te /
translated: The method of non-abiding is when one abides in benefiting sentient beings without abiding in peace and signs, like a bird in the sky and on the ground.

original: de na gnas pa ma yin zhes bya ba ni nam mkha' kho na la 'gro ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de na gnas pa ma yin zhes bya ba ni nam mkha' kho na la 'gro ba'i phyir ro //
translated: He does not abide there means that he does not abide in the sky itself.

original: rnam thar sgo zhes bya ba ni stong pa dang mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i bdag nyid yin te /
analyzed: rnam thar sgo zhes bya ba ni stong pa dang mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i bdag nyid yin te /
translated: The door of liberation is the nature of emptiness, signlessness, and wishlessness.

original: grol ba'i thabs yin pa'i phyir ro //üîΩsmon lam gyi 'phen pas rjes su 'jug pa'i thabs ni 'phong dpyad la mkhas pa ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du mda' gnam du 'phangs pa 'dzin pa de ltar shes rab la gnas pa sngon gyi smon lam gyi 'phen pa'i rjes su 'jug pas yang dag pa'i mtha'
analyzed: grol ba'i thabs yin pa'i phyir ro // smon lam gyi 'phen pas rjes su 'jug pa'i thabs ni 'phong dpyad la mkhas pa ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du mda' gnam du 'phangs pa 'dzin pa de ltar shes rab la gnas pa sngon gyi smon lam gyi 'phen pa'i rjes su 'jug pas yang dag pa'i mtha'
translated: because it is the means of liberation.üîΩThe means of engaging in the projection of a vow is like the skill in archery whereby one holds an arrow in the air as long as one wishes.

original: mngon sum du mi byed pa'i phyir /
analyzed: mngon sum du mi byed pa'i phyir /
translated: Thus, one who is established in wisdom engages in the projection of a vow from a previous vow and does not actualize the reality limit.üîΩFor example, the text states:

original: dper na 'phong bslabs zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'byung ba yin te /
analyzed: dper na 'phong bslabs zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'byung ba yin te /
translated: ‚ÄúLike the skill in archery,‚Äù etc.

original: mda' gzhan dag ces bya ba ni gzhan dag gis so //üîΩphyi bzhin rgyud mar long btags nas //
analyzed: mda' gzhan dag ces bya ba ni gzhan dag gis so // phyi bzhin rgyud mar long btags nas //
translated: ‚ÄúOther arrows‚Äù means other than the first.

original: zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni /
translated: ‚ÄúIn succession‚Äù meansüîΩin a series.

original: rgyud mar 'phangs te sngar 'phangs pa'i mda' des la lhung du mi ster ro zhes byar sbyar ro //
analyzed: rgyud mar 'phangs te sngar 'phangs pa'i mda' des la lhung du mi ster ro zhes byar sbyar ro //
translated: ‚ÄúIn succession‚Äù means that the later arrow is shot before the former one falls.

original: thabs ni snying brtse ba la sogs pa'i @157b mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: thabs ni snying brtse ba la sogs pa'i @157b mtshan nyid do //
translated: The means is the characteristic of compassion, etc.

original: stobs ni gnas dang gnas ma yin pa shes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: stobs ni gnas dang gnas ma yin pa shes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: The power is the knowledge of the possible and impossible, etc.

original: rdzu 'phrul ni nam mkha' la 'gro ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul ni nam mkha' la 'gro ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: Miraculous action is the ability to walk on water, to fly through the air, and so on.

original: rnam dpyod pa ni ngo bo nyid med par lta ba'o //
analyzed: rnam dpyod pa ni ngo bo nyid med par lta ba'o //
translated: Conceptualization is the view that things are without intrinsic reality.

original: stong nyid dam pa ni rnam par rtog pa'i bag chags mtha' dag med pa'o //
analyzed: stong nyid dam pa ni rnam par rtog pa'i bag chags mtha' dag med pa'o //
translated: The highest emptiness is the absence of all the habitual tendencies of conceptualization.

original: de thob mi byed pa ni tshogs yongs su ma rdzogs pas de mngon sum byas na lhun gyis grub par 'gro ba yongs su skyob pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de thob mi byed pa ni tshogs yongs su ma rdzogs pas de mngon sum byas na lhun gyis grub par 'gro ba yongs su skyob pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The non-attainment of that is because, when one has not completed the two stores of merit and knowledge, one does not actualize it, because one would then lack the spontaneous performance of the protection of beings.

original: tshogs yongs su rdzogs pa yang dag pa'i rnam par rtog pa'i mngon par sgrub pas bsgrub par bya ba yin pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: tshogs yongs su rdzogs pa yang dag pa'i rnam par rtog pa'i mngon par sgrub pas bsgrub par bya ba yin pa'i phyir te /
translated: The completion of the two stores is to be accomplished by the actualization of correct conceptualization,

original: sa mi g-yo ba las gal te sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' de mngon par sgrub pa'i sgo la gzhug pa ma mdzad na de nyid 'di'i yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro zhes gang gsungs pa lta bu yin no
analyzed: sa mi g-yo ba las gal te sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' de mngon par sgrub pa'i sgo la gzhug pa ma mdzad na de nyid 'di'i yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro zhes gang gsungs pa lta bu yin no

original: // skyo ba med pa'i thabs ni dge slong rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa nam mkha' la dus gcig tu tsho 'phrul byed pa dag gis mi skyo ba bzhin du stong pa nyid la gnas pa yang sems can skyob pa'i bya ba dag gis skyo bar mi 'gyur ba'i phyir
analyzed: // skyo ba med pa'i thabs ni dge slong rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa nam mkha' la dus gcig tu tsho 'phrul byed pa dag gis mi skyo ba bzhin du stong pa nyid la gnas pa yang sems can skyob pa'i bya ba dag gis skyo bar mi 'gyur ba'i phyir
translated: The means of non-discouragement is like the non-discouragement of the bhiksus who have magical power and who perform miracles in the sky at one time.

original: dper na dge slong zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'byung ba yin te /
analyzed: dper na dge slong zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'byung ba yin te /

analyzed: dge slong smos pa ni de la the tshom med pa rnams 'di la the tshom mi za bar bya ba'i phyir ro //

original: cig char cho 'phrul byed pa ni dus gcig tu bya ba 'gal bar ston pa'o //
analyzed: cig char cho 'phrul byed pa ni dus gcig tu bya ba 'gal bar ston pa'o //

analyzed: de bstan pa'i phyir 'gro dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /

analyzed: skyo ba med cing zhes bya ba ni bsam pa'i sgo nas so //
translated: Non-discouragement is from the point of view of intention.

original: dub ba med ces bya ba ni sbyor ba'i sgo nas so //
analyzed: dub ba med ces bya ba ni sbyor ba'i sgo nas so //

original: ye shes rdzu 'phrul pha rol phyin //
analyzed: ye shes rdzu 'phrul pha rol phyin //

analyzed: zhes bya ba ni thabs dang ye shes don yod pa phul du byung ba'o //
translated: This is the excellence of the skillful means and intuition of the bodhisattva.

original: zung du 'brel ba'i thabs ni mi g-yang sa chen por mchong ba bzhin du snying brtse ba sngon du 'gro ba'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo mngon du gyur na shes rab dang thabs kyi gdugs gnyis yongs su bzung bas sa gzhan du mi ltung ba'i phyir /

translated: The skillful means of union is like a person jumping from a great precipice, for when the bodhisattva, with compassion preceding, manifests the door of liberation, he does not fall to other stages, because he has taken hold of the two umbrellas of wisdom and skillful means.

original: dper na mi 'ga' zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'byung ba yin te /
analyzed: dper na mi 'ga' zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'byung ba yin te /
translated: For example, a person, etc.

analyzed: mchod par byed cing zhes bya ba ni 'dor bar byed pa ste lus zhes bya bar sbyar ro //

translated: Not falling means not being injured.üîΩAs far as he goes means as far as he travels.

analyzed: ji snyed pa der bde blag kho nar 'gro bar 'gyur ro snyam du dgongs pa yin no //

original: chos rnams zhes bya ba ni stong pa nyid la sogs pa zhes bya bar skabs dang sbyar ro //
analyzed: chos rnams zhes bya ba ni stong pa nyid la sogs pa zhes bya bar skabs dang sbyar ro //

original: 'gro ba la phan pa skyed pa'i thabs ni rin po che'i gling du phyin pa bzhin du ting nge 'dzin gyi mchog thob pa 'jig rten la snying brtse bas yang dag pa'i rnam par rtog pa mngon du byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'gro ba la phan pa skyed pa'i thabs ni rin po che'i gling du phyin pa bzhin du ting nge 'dzin gyi mchog thob pa 'jig rten la snying brtse bas yang dag pa'i rnam par rtog pa mngon du byed pa'i phyir ro //

analyzed: de lta ma yin na gzhan gyi don mi 'thad pa'i phyir /

analyzed: dper na rin chen 'dod pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'byung ba yin te / phyir yang khyim du 'ong 'gyur ba //

analyzed: zhes bya ba ni slar 'ong bar 'gyur ba zhes bya bar sbyar ro //

original: stong pa nyid ni yod tan rin po che'i 'byung gnas yin pa'i phyir dang sred pa'i chu med pa'i phyir rin chen gyi gling yin no //
analyzed: stong pa nyid ni yod tan rin po che'i 'byung gnas yin pa'i phyir dang sred pa'i chu med pa'i phyir rin chen gyi gling yin no //
translated: Since emptiness is the source of the jewel of good qualities and since there is no water of craving, it is the island of jewels.

analyzed: grong khyer gang yin pa dang / grong rdal gang yin par zhes bya bar sbyar ro //

original: ma gtogs par zhes bya ba ni snying rjes @160a * //
analyzed: ma gtogs par zhes bya ba ni snying rjes @160a * //
translated: Except for those who are not included, who are objects of compassion.üîΩ

original: sems can yongs su smin par byed pa dang shes rab kyis byang chub la sbyor ba 'ba' zhig tu zad de /
analyzed: sems can yongs su smin par byed pa dang shes rab kyis byang chub la sbyor ba 'ba' zhig tu zad de /
translated: The phrase except for means that he is solely engaged in bringing sentient beings to maturity through compassion and in applying himself to enlightenment through wisdom.

original: grong la sogs pa na gnas kyang sems srid pa'i bde ba la ma chags so snyam du dgongs pa yin no //
analyzed: grong la sogs pa na gnas kyang sems srid pa'i bde ba la ma chags so snyam du dgongs pa yin no //
translated: The idea is that even though he lives in a village, etc., his mind is not attached to the pleasures of existence.

original: gzhar mi skyed ces bya ba ni dgra bcom pa dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la nam yang dga' ba skyed par mi byed do zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: gzhar mi skyed ces bya ba ni dgra bcom pa dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la nam yang dga' ba skyed par mi byed do zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: The phrase never generates means that he never generates delight in the vehicle of the arhat or pratyekabuddha.

original: 'di ni dben par gsungs zhes bya ba ni srid pa dang zhi ba la ma chags pas dben pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'di ni dben par gsungs zhes bya ba ni srid pa dang zhi ba la ma chags pas dben pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The phrase this is said to be solitude means that it is solitude because it is not attached to existence or to peace.

original: de las gzhan pa ni skye bos shin tu dben pa na gnas kyang 'dre bar gnas pa kho na yin pas /
analyzed: de las gzhan pa ni skye bos shin tu dben pa na gnas kyang 'dre bar gnas pa kho na yin pas /
translated: The other is dwelling in solitude in the sense of being isolated from people, but he is only dwelling in association.

original: gang zhig ces bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: gang zhig ces bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: The verse states, He who, etc.

original: 'di ni zhes bya ba ni bshad ma thag pa'i dben pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni zhes bya ba ni bshad ma thag pa'i dben pa'o //

original: lhag pa'i nga rgyal gyi yul bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: lhag pa'i nga rgyal gyi yul bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: In order to demonstrate the object of excessive pride,

original: byang chub sems dpa' 'gro ba'i don zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' 'gro ba'i don zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: he says, ‚ÄúThe bodhisattva who is engaged in the welfare of the world,‚Äù and so on.

original: de la zhes bya ba ni grong gi nang na spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la'o //
analyzed: de la zhes bya ba ni grong gi nang na spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la'o //
translated: There, in the village, the bodhisattva is engaged in the welfare of the world.

original: brnyas pa byed pa zhes bya ba ni khyad du gsol par byed pa'o //
analyzed: brnyas pa byed pa zhes bya ba ni khyad du gsol par byed pa'o //
translated: He is despised means he is disparaged.

original: ji ltar zhe na 'di ni dgon dben zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
analyzed: ji ltar zhe na 'di ni dgon dben zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //

translated: Therefore, between the two, the village and the forest, the previously explained solitude is the best.

original: 'di'i che ba'i bdag nyid bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: 'di'i che ba'i bdag nyid bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: In order to demonstrate his greatness,

original: byang chub sems dpa' drod snyom zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' drod snyom zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: he says, ‚ÄúThe bodhisattva who is indifferent to heat and cold,‚Äù and so on.

original: byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig dben pa de lta bu la drod snyom zhing brnyas par byed pa de ni dben pa gzhan la brten pa'i phyir bdag nyid nyams shing phung bar 'gyur ba 'ba' zhig tu zad de /

translated: The bodhisattva who is indifferent to such solitude, who is contemptuous of it, is only bringing ruin on himself, because he is relying on another kind of solitude.

original: de lus dub ba 'bras bu med pa tsam gyis zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: de lus dub ba 'bras bu med pa tsam gyis zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: He is only exhausting his body without result.

original: bshes gnyen dam pa la brten pa'i rtags ni nad pa sman pa la brten pa bzhin du nga rgyal bcom zhing skyo ba med par dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bsnyen bkur byed pa'i phyir /
analyzed: bshes gnyen dam pa la brten pa'i rtags ni nad pa sman pa la brten pa bzhin du nga rgyal bcom zhing skyo ba med par dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bsnyen bkur byed pa'i phyir /

analyzed: de lta bas na zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //

original: gso phyir zhes bya ba ni gso bar bya ba'i phyir te /
analyzed: gso phyir zhes bya ba ni gso bar bya ba'i phyir te /
