original: sgrub pa de yang gtsor shes rab yin pas shes rab dam pa la mngon par brtson pa'i rtags ni bde bar gshegs pa thams cad kyi bgrod pa gcig pa yin pa nyid kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa kho na la mngon par brtson pa yin
analyzed: sgrub pa de yang gtsor shes rab yin pas shes rab dam pa la mngon par brtson pa'i rtags ni bde bar gshegs pa thams cad kyi bgrod pa gcig pa yin pa nyid kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa kho na la mngon par brtson pa yin
translated: Since that practice is primarily wisdom, the sign of striving for the highest wisdom is that he strives only for the perfection of wisdom, because it is the sole path of all the Sugatas.

original: pa'i phyir / rgyal ba 'das dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
analyzed: pa'i phyir / rgyal ba 'das dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
translated: The verse beginning the Victorious Ones of the past and so on is stated.

original: gsal zhes bya ba ni gsal bar byed pa ste rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi dbang du byas pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gsal zhes bya ba ni gsal bar byed pa ste rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi dbang du byas pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The word clear means that which makes clear, because it is based on the knowledge of all aspects.

original: sgron ma ni lam shes pa nyid kyi rgyu las byung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sgron ma ni lam shes pa nyid kyi rgyu las byung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: The word lamp is because it arises from the cause of the knowledge of the path.

original: snang ba ni thams cad shes pa nyid kyi rang gi ngo bor rab tu ston pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: snang ba ni thams cad shes pa nyid kyi rang gi ngo bor rab tu ston pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The word light is because it shows the essence of the knowledge of all things.

original: ston mchog ces bya ba ni nyon mongs pa tshar gcod par byed pa'i phyir dang byang chub gzhan la skyob pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ston mchog ces bya ba ni nyon mongs pa tshar gcod par byed pa'i phyir dang byang chub gzhan la skyob pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The word supreme teacher is because it conquers the afflictions and protects other enlightenments.

original: chos thams cad tha dad pa med par rtogs pa'i rtags ni chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par mtshan nyid gcig par yongs su gcod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: chos thams cad tha dad pa med par rtogs pa'i rtags ni chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par mtshan nyid gcig par yongs su gcod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The sign of the realization of the non-difference of all things is the ascertainment of the identity of the own-being of all things in the perfection of wisdom.

original: ji ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'byung ba yin te /
analyzed: ji ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'byung ba yin te /
translated: As it is said, etc.

original: mtshan nyid stong zhes bya ba ni 'dzin pa la sogs pa'i rnam pas so //
analyzed: mtshan nyid stong zhes bya ba ni 'dzin pa la sogs pa'i rnam pas so //
translated: Empty of characteristics means by the aspects of grasping, etc.

original: chos 'di thams cad ces bya ba ni gzugs la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: chos 'di thams cad ces bya ba ni gzugs la sogs pa'o //
translated: All these things means form, etc.

original: mtshan nyid de dang 'drar shes zhes bya ba ni de kho na bzhin du 'dzin pa la sogs pa'i rnam pas dben par ro //
analyzed: mtshan nyid de dang 'drar shes zhes bya ba ni de kho na bzhin du 'dzin pa la sogs pa'i rnam pas dben par ro //
translated: One should know the characteristic as like that means as devoid of the aspects of grasping, etc., in just that way.

original: de nyid gsal bar bya ba'i phyir stong zhing zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
analyzed: de nyid gsal bar bya ba'i phyir stong zhing zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
translated: In order to clarify just that, it is said, Empty, etc.

original: 'di skad du bshad pa yin te /
analyzed: 'di skad du bshad pa yin te /
translated: This is what is being said:

original: lkog tu gyur pa ni 'dzin pa nyid ma yin te bdag nyid kyi byed pa mi shes pa ni 'dzin pa nyid du rab tu ma grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: lkog tu gyur pa ni 'dzin pa nyid ma yin te bdag nyid kyi byed pa mi shes pa ni 'dzin pa nyid du rab tu ma grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The hidden is not itself grasping, because the unknown activity of itself is not established as grasping.

original: @161a * // rang gi ngo bor mi shes pa ni yod pa'i tha snyad kyi yul ma yin te /
analyzed: @161a * // rang gi ngo bor mi shes pa ni yod pa'i tha snyad kyi yul ma yin te /
translated: That which is not known as its own nature is not the object of the convention of existence.

original: de lta na ni thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid du thams cad du yod par thal bar 'gyur pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de lta na ni thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid du thams cad du yod par thal bar 'gyur pa'i phyir ro //
translated: If it were, it would follow, absurdly, that everything would exist as the nature of everything.

original: yul yongs su gcod pa'i sgo nas de rab tu 'grub pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: yul yongs su gcod pa'i sgo nas de rab tu 'grub pa yang ma yin te /
translated: Nor is it established by way of the object's being ascertained,

original: lkog tu gyur pa'i bdag nyid dang yul rig par 'brel pa ma grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: lkog tu gyur pa'i bdag nyid dang yul rig par 'brel pa ma grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the connection between the object and the cognition of the hidden nature is not established.

original: med na mi 'byung bar rab tu grub pa med pa ni 'ga' yang gang gi rtags kyi dngos po yang ma yin te kha cang thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: med na mi 'byung bar rab tu grub pa med pa ni 'ga' yang gang gi rtags kyi dngos po yang ma yin te kha cang thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Nor is that which is not established as being a necessary concomitant of something the evidence for that something, because that would lead to an absurdity.

original: gal te 'dzin pa med pa ni rang gi bems po'i bdag nyid yul yongs su gcod pa mi 'thad pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: gal te 'dzin pa med pa ni rang gi bems po'i bdag nyid yul yongs su gcod pa mi 'thad pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: If you say, It is not apprehended because it is not tenable for the insentient nature of itself to ascertain the object,

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: then that is not so.

original: de dag rjes su 'brel ba rtogs pa med par de lta bu mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de dag rjes su 'brel ba rtogs pa med par de lta bu mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is impossible for that to be the case without the cognition of their connection.

original: yul bems po'i bdag nyid ni rang gi ngo bo mi 'dor ba yin pas 'dzin pa yod du zin kyang ji ltar shes par 'gyur /
analyzed: yul bems po'i bdag nyid ni rang gi ngo bo mi 'dor ba yin pas 'dzin pa yod du zin kyang ji ltar shes par 'gyur /
translated: The object, which is the nature of an inert thing, does not abandon its own nature. Therefore, even if it is apprehended, how could it be known?

original: 'on te de'i rang gi ngo bo nyams na rang gis rtogs pa'i bdag nyid kho nar skye bas de'i rnam pa yongs su gcod pa'i phyir ro zhe na ni /
analyzed: 'on te de'i rang gi ngo bo nyams na rang gis rtogs pa'i bdag nyid kho nar skye bas de'i rnam pa yongs su gcod pa'i phyir ro zhe na ni /
translated: But if its own nature is impaired, it is born as the nature of just the cognition that knows it, and therefore the aspect of that is determined.

original: 'dzin pa de'i ngo bo skyed par byed pa yin pa 'ba' zhig tu 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'dzin pa de'i ngo bo skyed par byed pa yin pa 'ba' zhig tu 'gyur ro //
translated: It would be just the producer of the nature of that apprehension.

original: de ni mi 'dod pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: de ni mi 'dod pa yang ma yin te /
translated: But that is not unacceptable,

original: rang dbang du rig pa yang gzhan la rag las te skye bar khas len pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rang dbang du rig pa yang gzhan la rag las te skye bar khas len pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is accepted that the awareness that is independent is born in dependence on another.

original: gal te ngas shes so zhes bya bar bdag tu 'dzin pa po shes pa'i phyir sngon po la sogs pa'i rnam pa nyams su myongs ba rang dbang can ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: gal te ngas shes so zhes bya bar bdag tu 'dzin pa po shes pa'i phyir sngon po la sogs pa'i rnam pa nyams su myongs ba rang dbang can ma yin no zhe na /
translated: If it is said that the experience of the aspect of blue and so on is not independent because the apprehender of the thought ‚ÄúI know‚Äù knows it,

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: that is not so.

original: de ltar nyams su myong ba med pa'i rnam par rtog pa de'i rtags kyis rjes su 'brang ba ma yin pa ni slob pa'i rtog pa bzhin tu tshad ma ma yin pa'i phyir dang / tshad mas gnod pa'i yang phyir te /
analyzed: de ltar nyams su myong ba med pa'i rnam par rtog pa de'i rtags kyis rjes su 'brang ba ma yin pa ni slob pa'i rtog pa bzhin tu tshad ma ma yin pa'i phyir dang / tshad mas gnod pa'i yang phyir te /
translated: Because that conceptual thought which does not experience in that way is not a valid cognition, like the conceptual thought of a learner, and because it is contradicted by valid cognition.

original: sngon po la sogs par snang ba ni gzhan gyi byed pas dben par snang ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sngon po la sogs par snang ba ni gzhan gyi byed pas dben par snang ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the appearance as blue, etc. is an appearance devoid of the operation of another.

original: 'jig rten pa'i tha snyad thams cad ni snang ba dang rnam par rtog pa la rag las pa kho na yin la de gnyis kyang rang rig pa'i mtshan nyid yin pas 'dzin pa po lkog tu gyur pa gzhan brtag pa'i tshegs dbyung ba ni mi dgos so //
analyzed: 'jig rten pa'i tha snyad thams cad ni snang ba dang rnam par rtog pa la rag las pa kho na yin la de gnyis kyang rang rig pa'i mtshan nyid yin pas 'dzin pa po lkog tu gyur pa gzhan brtag pa'i tshegs dbyung ba ni mi dgos so //
translated: All mundane conventions depend only on appearance and conceptual thought, and since those two have the characteristic of being self-knowing, it is not necessary to posit a separate, hidden apprehending subject.

original: gal te de bas na 'dzin pa'i rnam pa ni mngon sum yin la gzung ba ni lkog tu gyur pa yin du zad mod ce na /
analyzed: gal te de bas na 'dzin pa'i rnam pa ni mngon sum yin la gzung ba ni lkog tu gyur pa yin du zad mod ce na /
translated: But if you say that therefore the aspect of the apprehender is direct perception and the apprehended is merely hidden,

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: that is not so.

original: phan tshun 'gal @161b ba'i phyir te /
analyzed: phan tshun 'gal @161b ba'i phyir te /
translated: Because they are mutually contradictory.

original: lkog tu gyur pa nyid ni rtogs par ma gyur pa'i rnam pa yin la gzung ba nyid ni rtogs par gyur pa'i rang bzhin yin pas de dag gcig la gcig par ji ltar 'gyur /
analyzed: lkog tu gyur pa nyid ni rtogs par ma gyur pa'i rnam pa yin la gzung ba nyid ni rtogs par gyur pa'i rang bzhin yin pas de dag gcig la gcig par ji ltar 'gyur /
translated: The hidden is the form that is not perceived, and the apprehended is the form that is perceived. How can they be one?

original: phyi rol gyi don lkog tu gyur pa yin na nyams su myong ba ni de las byung ba dang 'dra ba dag gis kyang de 'dzin pa nyid du rung ba ma yin te /
analyzed: phyi rol gyi don lkog tu gyur pa yin na nyams su myong ba ni de las byung ba dang 'dra ba dag gis kyang de 'dzin pa nyid du rung ba ma yin te /
translated: If external objects are hidden, it is not possible for an experience to apprehend them, even though it arises in a form that resembles them.

original: shin tu mngon sum du ma gyur pa ni skyed par byed pa dang 'dra ba dag tu rab tu mi 'grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: shin tu mngon sum du ma gyur pa ni skyed par byed pa dang 'dra ba dag tu rab tu mi 'grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because that which is not clearly manifest is not established as being like that which produces it.

original: nyams su myong bar so sor nges pa ni rang gi rgyu las byung ba de la rag las te 'byung ba kho na yin no //
analyzed: nyams su myong bar so sor nges pa ni rang gi rgyu las byung ba de la rag las te 'byung ba kho na yin no //
translated: The experience is ascertained individually, and it arises in dependence on its cause.

original: de lta bas na bdag nyid kyis bsal ba'i phyogs la lan 'debs pa'i yongs su ngal ba ni don med do //
analyzed: de lta bas na bdag nyid kyis bsal ba'i phyogs la lan 'debs pa'i yongs su ngal ba ni don med do //
translated: Therefore, it is pointless to tire oneself out with answers to a position that is refuted by one‚Äôs own words.

original: gal te gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i mtshan nyid de dag ni grags pa kho na yin te /
analyzed: gal te gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i mtshan nyid de dag ni grags pa kho na yin te /
translated: The characteristics of the apprehended and the apprehender are well known.

original: phyi dang nang gi sngon po la sogs pa dang sim pa la sogs pa'i tshor ba dag ni yul dang yul can gyi ngo bo nyid du rtogs pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: phyi dang nang gi sngon po la sogs pa dang sim pa la sogs pa'i tshor ba dag ni yul dang yul can gyi ngo bo nyid du rtogs pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: because external and internal blue, etc., and feelings of pleasure, etc., are understood to be the nature of subject and object.

original: de dang rigs pa dang ldan pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de dang rigs pa dang ldan pa ma yin te /
translated: That is not reasonable.

original: ba lang gi rva lta bur phan tshun yongs su 'dzin pa'i byed pas stong pa de dag ni dus gcig tu snang bas gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i dngos po so sor nges par mi 'thad pa'i phyir ro //
